J1 Template

    become a patron

    Patron allows fans — the patrons — to pay creators for their work. Many of these creators are influencers: photographers on Instagram, comedians on YouTube, podcasters that tweet, creative technicians providing useful software, tools and tutorials.

    Simple like this.

    Become a Patron

    What does that mean? A Patron support a Creator for the provided content they love, they like to use: excellent content services — created with passion.

    What does a creator need to provide outstanding, useful products to the people?

    No surprise: time and money. What is, vice versa, quite the same. But that’s not all.
